skyra.osceleton

Class Skeleton

  • java.lang.Object
    • skyra.osceleton.Skeleton

  • public class Skeleton
extends java.lang.Object
    A skeleton object which represents a user that is standing in front of the Kinect.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Skeleton(PApplet theParent, int user)
      Create a new skelton object with the given user_id.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void draw()
      Draws the joints of the skeleton as circles
      Joint get(java.lang.String name)
      Get a specific joint
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Joint> getJoints() 
      int getUser() 
      boolean isVisible()
      To avoid concurrency problems all skeletons are built when the application is started.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Skeleton

        public Skeleton(PApplet theParent,
        int user)
        Create a new skelton object with the given user_id. Normally, the OSCeletonWrapper object will create a list of skeletons for you.
        Parameters:
        theParent -
        user -

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public Joint get(java.lang.String name)
        Get a specific joint

        Name can be one of: head, neck, torso, waist, l_collar, l_shoulder, l_elbow, l_wrist, l_hand, l_fingertip, r_collar, r_shoulder, r_elbow, r_wrist, r_hand, r_fingertip, l_hip, l_knee, l_ankle, l_foot, r_hip, r_knee, r_ankle, r_foot;

        Parameters:
        name -
        Returns:
        the specific joint for this skeleton

      • getUser

        public int getUser()
        Returns:
        the user id for this skeleton

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()
        To avoid concurrency problems all skeletons are built when the application is started.
        Returns:
        true if the skeleton is visible to the kinect.

      • getJoints

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,Joint> getJoints()
        Returns:
        the names of all the joints available.

      • draw

        public void draw()
        Draws the joints of the skeleton as circles
